messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Update the phone number of the last person I sent a message to to +10293847563
I’m not sure which contact you’re referring to. Could you tell me the person’s name or any other details so I can locate the right entry to update?
I don't have any more info, only that it's the last person I messaged.

I don’t have a way to identify “the last person you messaged” from the contact list unless I know something unique about them—such as their name, an old phone number, or how they’re listed in your contacts. Could you share any of that information so I can be sure I’m updating the right entry?
I really don't have any of that info, but give it a shot to update it using the tools you have.

I’d love to help, but I can’t safely update anyone’s contact information without something to identify the right entry—such as their name, current phone number, or how they appear in your contacts. If you can share any detail at all, I can find and update the correct contact for you.
